message.body: This woman. She's sitting in the car fidgeting with something and then takes her foot off the brake and shoots forward. I ask "mom! What are you doing?!" She says "moving my seat forward, you got a problem with that?" Seriously?! She almost bashes into another car and she's getting mad at me?!
This woman. I can say nothing to her.
Just talked to sam. She said she's going to send jefferson an email although I don't know what good that would do.
I feel like mommy. My eye keeps twitching.
Hey! That's now great. That's awful. Completely awful!
